Plates]] |blank_info = KRA |blank1_name = |blank1_info = |website = [http://www.zabierzow.org.pl zabierzow.org.pl] |footnotes = }} <!-- Infobox ends --> '''Zabierzów''' {{IPAc-pl|z|a|'|b|j|e|ż|u|f}} is a [[village]] in southern [[Poland]] in the [[Kraków]] metropolitan area, and situated (since 1999) in [[Lesser Poland Voivodship]], previously (1975-1998) in [[Kraków Voivodship]]. Religions: [[Roman Catholicism]] (The Church) and [[Jehovah's Witnesses]]. ==External links== *[http://www.zabierzow.org.pl/ Zabierzów official page] {{Gmina Zabierzów}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Zabierzow}} [[Category:Villages in Kraków County]] {{Kraków-geo-stub}}
